contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = KCEC | station_logo = [[File:KCEC50-012013.png]] | location = [[Denver, Colorado]] | city = | station_branding = Univision Colorado <small>(general)</small><br>Noticias Univision Colorado <small>(newscasts)</small> | station_slogan = | analog = | digital = 51 ([[ultra high frequency|UHF]])<br />[[Virtual channel|Virtual]]: 50 ([[Program and System Information Protocol|PSIP]]) | subchannels = 50.1 Univision HD<br />50.2 [[LATV]] | other_chs = | affiliations = [[Univision]] | owner = [[Entravision Communications|Entravision Communications Corporation]] | licensee = Entravision Holdings, LLC | founded = | airdate = October 18, 1990 | callsign_meaning = '''C'''olorado<br>'''E'''ntravision<br>'''C'''ommunications | sister_stations = [[KTFD-DT]] | former_callsigns = KSHP (1990-1991) | former_channel_numbers = '''Analog''':<br>50 (UHF, 1990-2009) | former_affiliations = | effective_radiated_power = 900 [[kilowatt|kW]] | HAAT = 232.5 m | class = | facility_id = [http://www.fcc.gov/fcc-bin/tvq?list=0&facid=24514 24514] | coordinates = {{coord|39|43|58|N|105|14|8|W|type:landmark_scale:2000|name=KCEC}} | homepage = [http://www.somosnoticiascolorado.com/ www.somosnoticiascolorado.com] }} '''KCEC''', digital channel 51 (virtual channel 50), is a [[television station]] based in [[Denver, Colorado]], [[United States|USA]] and owned by [[Entravision]]. It is an affiliate of the [[Spanish language]] [[Univision]] network. [[File:KCEC50.png|thumb|left|KCEC's logo prior to January 1, 2013]] KCEC first went on the air on October 18, 1990. KCEC, along with Entravision's other TV and Radio stations in Denver have a unique reach. According to BizJournals.com, Entravision estimates that its TV stations reach about 92% of the Hispanic community in Denver, making it an ideal advertising opportunity for any company who would like to reach that segment of the population (33% of Denver). [http://www.somosnoticiascolorado.com KCEC's website] went live in 2008 and is among the most popular Spanish language sites in the area. The website features live time news stories and local promotions. Starting in 2012 website visitors can also watch the local news broadcast live on the website. ==External links== *{{TVQ|KCEC}} *{{BIA|KCEC|TV|TV}} {{Denver TV}} {{Other Colorado Stations}} {{Entravision Communications}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kcec (Tv)}} [[Category:Channel 51 digital TV stations in the United States]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1990]] [[Category:Television stations in Colorado]] [[Category:Channel 50 virtual TV stations in the United States]] [[Category:Spanish-language media in Colorado]] {{Colorado-tv-station-stub}}
